backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with authorization, donor profiles, donations, spending, user profiles, and site metrics, including methods for profile management and donation handling.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a simple migration module that returns state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used across the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global CSS variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application router, defines all routes, and wraps the app with theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpendingFo: Form component for admins to record spending with validation, balance checks, and mutation submission.
Protects admin-only sections by checking authentication and admin status, showing access-denied or loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and clearing cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter basic info and save it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/donate/DonationF: Form for submitting donations, handling both authenticated and anonymous donors and sending data to the backend.
frontend/src/components/donors/DonorsTab: Displays a clickable table of donor profiles with avatars, join dates, and total donated amounts.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Simple access‑denied page with an error icon, message, and link back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai with minor branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with metrics, navigation links, donate/login actions, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout that tracks site views and live viewer status, wraps pages with header/footer, and shows the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerFil: UI controls to filter transactions by type and sort order.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerTab: Table listing donation and spending transactions with icons, amounts, dates, and status, linking to detail pages.
frontend/src/components/ledger/RecentTra: Displays a merged, sorted list of recent donation and spending transactions with navigation to detailed views.
frontend/src/components/ledger/SpendingB: Aggregates spending records into categories and renders a pie chart visualization using Recharts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating donation, spending, metrics, and donor-related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDonationsP: Admin interface for reviewing, confirming, or declining donations with status badges and recent activity.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSpendingPa: Admin-only page showing trust balance, recent spending, and a form to record new spending using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing trust balance, donation and spending stats, hero section, recent transactions, and navigation to donate or ledger pages.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Donation page displaying benefits of donating, user identity context, and a form for submitting a new donation.
frontend/src/pages/DonorDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed donor information with admin/non-admin views and lists the donor’s past donations.
frontend/src/pages/DonorsPage.tsx: Lists all donors with admin-sensitive data handling and fallback loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LedgerPage.tsx: Shows combined donation and spending transactions with filters and sorting options.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionDetailPage: Displays full details for a single donation or spending record, including formatted amount and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/approvedImage.ts: Exports the single approved image path used across the UI.
frontend/src/utils/phoneMask.ts: Provides a function to mask phone numbers by exposing only the first five characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, containers, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, existing features, issues, and architectural constraints.
